name: Aduco
description:
Graduation project from RADE 2022. 

A 2D side scroller. The player plays a boy searching for his brother that went ahead of him to find a new place to stay. The world is a wasteland with various danger, such as killer robots and traps. 

Play time: 5-10min

Disclaimer: Controls can be inverted or wonky :(

Hope you enjoy!

Contact: pallimakesgames@gmail.com
